name: Divirtual!
description:
n a dream device to get into the gaming world "Divirtual!",
two girls Haruna and Yuzuha stray into the realm of "tickling"...?

This is a tickling-themed RPG that Haruna and Yuzuha
get tickled by various monsters in the gaming world!

Tickling Monsters ... 23x
Defeat Events ... 4x
Tickling Events ... 3x

Difficulty level options and reminiscence room are available.

  • "Escape Maze" that was presented together at "Kusugulimit! 2" is NOT included in this product.
  • This game is created with RPG TKool MV. For Windows PC only.
  • Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing.
  • The save data of the trial version which was released on my blog cannot be transferred
    (but the save data of the trial version on DLsite can be transferred to the retail version).
